COMMENT_TX: $Cliff Floyd left the game due to an injured left Achilles tendon
$the fifth HR for Carlos Beltran in LCS play vs. the Cardinals (8 games)
$Shawn Green jumped for the ball at the wall; it hit his glove and caromed off the very top of the wall back onto the field
$hard shot off Steve Trachsel's right leg that caromed into LF; he left with a bruised thigh
$delay of several minutes as grounds crew replaced the first base bag; this was part of the normal base replacement during the game but they could not get the bag out of the ground
$steady drizzle for most of game, raining harder from 7th inning on
$tremendous catch by Endy Chavez well over wall, ball nearly came out of glove as he landed; Jim Edmonds had rounded 2B and was easily doubled off 1B
